original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edged up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Monday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 1.33 percent or 140.39 points to 10,735.41, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 1.97 percent or 61.34 points to 3,168.11.
The market generated a turnover of 2 billion rupees at 1230 hours.
Top gainers were Commercial Bank, Hatton National Bank and LOLC. (Colombo/July17/2023)
